import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Syst√®me d\'Irrigation Intelligent'; activeTab = 'stations'; setActiveTab(tab: string): void { this.activeTab = tab; } }
